:root { --accent: #9638c2; } body { font-family: sans-serif; margin: 0; padding: 0; } header { background: var(--accent); color: white; padding: 1rem; text-align: center; } .hero { position: relative; text-align: center; color: white; } .hero img { width: 100%; height: auto; } .hero h2, .hero p { position: absolute; width: 100%; text-align: center; } .hero h2 { top: 20%; } .hero p { top: 30%; } #about, #skills, #projects, #contact { padding: 1rem; } .skills-chips { display: flex; gap: 0.5rem; } .skills-chips span { background: var(--accent); color: white; padding: 0.5rem; border-radius: 1rem; } #projects article { margin-bottom: 1rem; } #projects img { width: 100%; height: auto; }
// Minimal JavaScript for interactivity if needed
